actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to delay the effective date for the generation-skipping provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1976 until August 5, 1976, which is the date on which such provisions were first acted on by either House of the Congress.

summary.text: Delays the effective date for the generation skipping transfers tax imposed by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 until August 5, 1976 (presently, April 30, 1976).

titles.title: A bill to delay the effective date for the generation-skipping provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1976 until August 5, 1976, which is the date on which such provisions were first acted on by either House of the Congress.
